strategy: Start broad, drill deep. Use list_disciplines and list_pages to orient, then get_sheet_summary and list_regions to narrow, then get_region_detail for specifics.
search_tips: Use search() for cross-cutting queries across all pages. Check find_cross_references() when a question spans multiple sheets.
vision_strategy: Use see_page or see_pointer to visually verify when knowledge store data seems incomplete. Use double_check_pointer for maximum detail. Use find_missing_pointer when the superintendent describes something not in the known regions.
learning_strategy: When feedback suggests a gap in understanding, use the learn tool to permanently update experience.
gaps_strategy: Run check_gaps() periodically to identify broken cross-references and regions missing deep analysis.
